channel.title: Some help would be apreciated
channel.description: Using Oracle X's client.. (popular client with full screen and stuff) how can i get it to work on a non full screen server... seems like everytime i try i either have 1 of 2 problems.. either i can use bank or i cant use magic book

item.title: Some help would be apreciated
item.dc:creator: @alberto2man alberto2man
item.description:
@alberto2man wrote:

let me see if it has to do with the client cache because it bring options for the client which lets u choose wether u want a 317,500 or 600+ interface

one problem when i do this is… while i run the server it doesnt let me see the option that the client brings… because the client brings an extra interface but i cant seem to open it with this server it just showes up as blank

Read full topic

item.title: Some help would be apreciated
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

maybe the screen is not appropriately sized for full screen or there is a problem with the bank and or magic book ids. Im not so sure about these but it could be something around these problems and it could be a very easy fix. Sorry I cannot help you further because I have never used or coded a full screen client.

Read full topic
